means: 当访问某个站点时，随某个HTML网页发送到你的浏览器中的一小段信息

sentence.Network_en: That was Nicholas's cue to ask for another chocolate chip cookie.
sentence.Network_cn: 那表示尼古拉斯还想要一块巧克力曲奇。

sentence.Network_en: Miss Melville took a cookie and nibbled at it.
sentence.Network_cn: 梅尔维尔小姐拿起一块饼干小口吃起来。

sentence.Network_en: She really is a tough cookie.

每个幸运签饼(fortune cookie)中，里面放置一张用英语写的小纸条，一句预测或祝愿幸福、发财、健康、顺利等内容的签语，句句美 …

幸运饼（fortune cookies）在美国最早出现在日本茶园。萩原诚的后裔声称将幸运饼从日本介绍到美国。

phrase.cizu_name: that's the way the cookie crumbles

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal, N. Amer.)that's how things turn out (often used of as an undesirable but unalterable situation)
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式，北美)（常指在不希望出现但又无法改变的情形下）事情就这样了

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Dutch koekje 'little cake', diminutive of koek

encyclopedia.content: 姓名：石小松 英文名：COOKIE（韩国侨生） 绰号：小甜饼，小饼干，小泡菜，泡菜脑袋 其他称呼：饼干武士，饼干太保，黄毛小子，小朝鲜冷面 身高：1.70米（《我为歌狂》） Cookie from第二季片头 1.81米（《我为歌狂终结本》） 1.82米（《米色爱情》） 血型：A型 星座：金牛座 个性：憨厚，单纯，极守信用，对人总往好里想。仗义，好玩、执著。 最喜欢的事：打鼓 我为歌狂8848 姓名：Cookie 身高：1.81米 血型：A型 星座：金牛座

entry.def: A cookie is a sweet biscuit.

entry.tran: 意志坚定的人;强硬的人;硬汉
entry.def: If you say that someone is a tough cookie, you mean that they have a strong and determined character.

entry.tran: “甜饼”，网络跟踪器(记录上网用户信息的软件)
entry.def: A cookie is a piece of computer software which enables a website you have visited to recognize you if you visit it again.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various small flat sweet cakes (`biscuit' is the British term)
2. the cook on a ranch or at a camp
3. a short line of text that a web site puts on your computer's hard drive when you access the web site

sentences.en: I've just made some chocolate-chip cookies.
sentences.cn: 我刚做了些巧克力甜饼。

jushi.english: She combined some sugar, flour and butter to make some cookies.
jushi.chinese: 她把白糖、面粉和黄油和在一起做小甜饼。

jushi.english: He detected Tom stealing cookies in the pantry.
jushi.chinese: 他发现汤姆正在食品储藏室偷饼干。

jushi.english: There was sand on the floor of the bar where enthusiastic drinkers had tossed their cookies the night before.
jushi.chinese: 酒吧间的地板上撒了沙子，那是昨晚酒鬼呕吐的地方。
